quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Jay Leno and Roswell
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, field, evans. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Jay Leno is widely known for his massive collection of these objects.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Automobiles

questions.question: Max Evans and Liz Parker get married in the series finale of Roswell.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: When he was a child, Jay Leno used to say that one day he would make this accomplishment, which turned out to be a prophesy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Take over Johnny Carsons job

questions.question: What did Michael give to Maria for Christmas in the sci-fi series Roswell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a car bumper

questions.question: In what field did Jay Leno get a Bachelors degree from the Emerson College?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Speech therapy

questions.question: Who sings the Roswell theme song Here with Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dido

questions.question: What close relative of Jay Leno was a Vietnam veteran?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His brother

questions.question: What unforgettable question did Jay Leno ask Hugh Grant on July 10, 1995 on the The Tonight Show in reference to Hughs arrest for being with a prostitute?

options.text: Whet the hell were you on?
What the hell were you thinking?
Dont you have a wife, man?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: What the hell were you thinking?

questions.question: In the Roswell episode entitled Heat Wave, where is the party that everyone attends held?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The old Soap Factory

questions.question: What is Jay Lenos real first name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: James

questions.question: What item does Michael make for Maria as an apology in the series Roswell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: napkin holder

questions.question: What was Jay Leno forbidden to do when he was a defense witness in the 2005 trial of Michael Jackson?

options.text: Talk about Michael Jackson in general
Tell jokes about Michael or the trial
Host the The Tonight Show for a while

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tell jokes about Michael or the trial

questions.question: What Roswell character utters the line, Take a Psych class, because you are controlling?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Liz Parker

questions.question: In the series Roswell Isabels alien name is Valence.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Why did Jay Leno claim that he didnt want to have corrective surgery to fix his mandibular prognathism?

options.text: Because of the long healing period
He liked himself the way he was
Because his wife said she would leave him if he ever did

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because of the long healing period

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Novel and Arrested Development

questions.question: Of what did prisoner John Coffey cure prison guard Paul Edgecombe in the novel The Green Mile?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Urinary Infection

questions.question: Which famous American director provides the narration for the sitcom Arrested Development?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ron Howard

questions.question: Which Emmy-award winning American writer and producer is credited as the creator of the sitcom Arrested Development?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mitchell Hurwitz

questions.question: Stephen Kings novel Firestarter was serialized in Omni magazine prior to being published in 1980.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Under what circumstances do Charlies parents meet in the novel Firestarter?

options.text: In an experimental drug trial in college
In a mental hospital as teenagers
At the scene of a 12-car pile-up

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In an experimental drug trial in college

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the title of the book written by Jay Leno in 2005?

options.text: How to Be the Funniest Kid in the Whole Wide World (or Just in Your Class)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: How to Be the Funniest Kid in the Whole Wide World (or Just in Your Class)

questions.question: Which character on the show Arrested Development had a so-called nevernude condition, as he was afraid of being completely naked?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tobias

questions.question: In what novel by Stephen King did Reverend William Rose and Father John Brigham lead their respective congregations into battle against each other?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Needful Things

questions.question: The horror novel Needful Things takes much of its plot from Ray Bradburys novel Something Wicked This Way Comes.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the name of the superhero cartoon character voiced by Jay Leno in the animated TV series The Fairly OddParents?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Crimson Chin

questions.question: What is the name of the hotel in the novel The Shining?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Overlook

questions.question: David Cross, who played Tobias on Arrested Development, was first approached by the shows producers to portray the role of this character.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Buster

questions.question: What was the name of the first novel by Stephen King in which the main character was a writer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Salems Lot

questions.question: In the TV sitcom Arrested Development, what is GOBs hobby and life work?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hes an illusionist.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Walter Cronkite and Arrested Development

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Megan

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Larry and Jack Bauer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vashon

options.text: I dont hate my mother anymore.
“I’m feeling pretty, pretty, pretty, pretty, pretty good.”
...and gosh darn it, people like me!

questions.question: What inappropriate garment is Larry repulsed by when he spots his male psychiatrist wearing it at the beach?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elisha Cuthbert

questions.question: When did the TV show Hawaii Five-O originally air?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1968-1980
